snippet: The gunman, who the authorities say was killed by Virginia state troopers after he fatally shot an officer at a bus station, had an extensive criminal record.
lead_paragraph: The gunman, who the authorities say was killed by Virginia state troopers after he fatally shot an officer at a bus station, had an extensive criminal record.

headline.main: Virginia Gunman Said He Hated Police, Ex-Girlfriend Says
headline.print_headline: Virginia Gunman Said He Hated Police, Ex-Girlfriend Says
